subject: Faulty throttle
description_text: As you can see from the video, the throttle pedal does not register and only works when I use my finger to press down on the load cell. And the load cell is much harder to register than the clutch for some reason, which is why it can't register anything when I try to use the throttle. If possible, can I get replacement parts or a new throttle?

conversations.body_text: Hi Ethan Nguyen,  You are using the latest version of SIMSONN Manager 2.1.2, correct? Please click “Offset” in the software to reset the initial signal to zero, and then recalibrate the pedals.      Please provide your order number. At the same time, please check whether the throttle pedal’s spring and pressure plate are damaged or have come loose, and verify that the RJ11 connector on the throttle is securely plugged in.

I'm using the latest software and tried that but now the throttle works but only over halfway through the throttle before it starts working. Also I ordered from the official aliexpress store 8206290101572984
